verses.roman: bhakti vinu mukti nāhi, bhaktye mukti haya

synonyms: bhakti—devotional service; vinu—without; mukti—liberation; nāhi—there is not; bhaktye—actually by devotional service; mukti haya—liberation is attained.
translation: "One does not attain liberation without rendering devotional service. Liberation is only attained by devotional service.
